strip.description: Removes leading and trailing white spaces from the         values in the specified columns.

strip_cols.description: Remove leading and trailing white spaces in columns names

roundvals.description: Rounds the values in the specified column to the specified float precision.

col.description: Name of the column to round.

precision.description: Number of decimal places to round to. Defaults to 2.

replace.description: Replaces all occurrences of a value in the specified column with a new value.

col.description: Name of the column to search.
